extension.description: [COLOR lime] [B] * CUBA AND OUR BEST WISHES * [/ B] [/ COLOR] [COLOR red] [B] CUBA-TV [/ B] [/ COLOR] based on LivetreamsPro by Shani "All rights to this author "this add-on is created in order to bring content to all Latinos especially Cubans who are outside the isla.Telegram [COLOR orange] telegram.me/cubatv [/ COLOR] (facebook) [ COLOR blue]/groups/addoncubatv [/ COLOR] [COLOR skyblue][B]!!! Thank you for enjoying our contenido¡¡¡[/B][/COLOR]

[COLOR lime][B]*CUBA Y NUESTROS MEJORES RECUERDOS*[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR red][B]CUBA-TV[/B][/COLOR] based on LivetreamsPro by Shani "All rights to this author" este add-on esta creado con el fin de llevar contenido a todos los latinos en especial a los cubanos que se encuentran fuera de la isla.Telegram:[COLOR orange]telegram.me/cubatv[/COLOR](facebook)[COLOR blue]/groups/addoncubatv[/COLOR] [COLOR skyblue][B]!!!Gracias por disfrutar de nuestro contenido¡¡¡[/B][/COLOR]
